text: w'in tkdhdhibu - 'ayuha alnas- rasulina mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam fima daeakum 'iilayh min eibadat allah whdh, faqad kadhabat jamaeat min qablikum rslha fima dethm 'iilayh min alhq, fhl bihim sakhit allh, wama ealaa alrraswl muhamad 'iilaa 'an yblghkm ean allah risalatah albalagh alwadh, waqad faeal
